title: Purchasing RP Broken???
body: I tried buying some RP and came up with an error. Dont know if this has to do with the new patch, but was wondering if anyone else has a similar problem?

replies.body: It's strange that you received an error upon payment, and we'd like to take a closer look at your issue.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will look individually with you.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
